projects.title: Partify
projects.subtitle: React TypeScript Node.js
projects.description: A collaborative music platform that allows multiple users to contribute to shared playlists in real-time. Features Spotify integration, real-time synchronization, and social voting mechanisms.

projects.title: SnackCheck
projects.subtitle: React Native JavaScript Expo
projects.description: A mobile application that helps users track nutritional information and discover healthier food alternatives through barcode scanning and nutritional analysis.
